Achievements.Name: Back Attack
Achievements.Description: Complete a Back Attack.

Achievements.Name: 100 Back Attacks
Achievements.Description: Complete 100 Back Attacks.

Achievements.Name: Multi-Monster Encounter
Achievements.Description: Complete a Multi-Monster Encounter.

Achievements.Name: 10+ Monsters in an Encounter
Achievements.Description: Win a Multi-Monster Encounter against at least 10 enemies.

Achievements.Name: 100 Monster Fights
Achievements.Description: Make Monster Fights happen 100 times.

Achievements.Name: Beat King Poo
Achievements.Description: Find and defeat the rare monster King Poo.

Achievements.Name: Beat Golden Poo Snake
Achievements.Description: Find and defeat the rare monster Golden Poo Snake.

Achievements.Name: Beat Gold Mecha Robo
Achievements.Description: Find and defeat the rare monster Gold Mecha Robo.

Achievements.Name: Mechat Shooting Stage 1: Perfect
Achievements.Description: Clear Mechat Shooting with no damage.

Achievements.Name: Wagon Escort: Perfect
Achievements.Description: While escorting the wagon, make sure that it takes no damage.

Achievements.Name: Dragon: Max One Class
Achievements.Description: Max out the rank for one Dragon class. Must go from 98 to 99 without using a Heart enhancement.

Achievements.Name: Minotaur: Max One Class
Achievements.Description: Max out the rank for one Minotaur class. Must go from 98 to 99 without using a Heart enhancement.

Achievements.Name: Phoenix: Max One Class
Achievements.Description: Max out the rank for one Phoenix class. Must go from 98 to 99 without using a Heart enhancement.

Achievements.Name: Dragon: Max All Class Ranks
Achievements.Description: Max out the rank for all Dragon classes. Must go from 98 to 99 without using a Heart enhancement.

Achievements.Name: Minotaur: Max All Classes
Achievements.Description: Max out the rank for all Minotaur classes. Must go from 98 to 99 without using a Heart enhancement.

Achievements.Name: Phoenix: Max All Classes
Achievements.Description: Max out the rank for all Phoenix classes. Must go from 98 to 99 without using a Heart enhancement.

Achievements.Name: Maxed Out All Character Levels
Achievements.Description: Make all your characters level 99.

Achievements.Name: Got Ultimate Weapon Bracelet
Achievements.Description: Find and obtain the rare Ultimate Weapon Bracelet.

Achievements.Name: Got Final War Necklace
Achievements.Description: Find and obtain the rare Final War Necklace.

Achievements.Name: Got Dragon Bracelet
Achievements.Description: Find and obtain the rare Dragon Bracelet.

Achievements.Name: Activated All Warp Devices
Achievements.Description: Activate all of the Warp Devices.

Achievements.Name: Removed All Barriers
Achievements.Description: Remove all barriers in the game.

Achievements.Name: Completed Monster Record
Achievements.Description: Fill up the Monster Record by defeating every monster.

Achievements.Name: Completed Item Record
Achievements.Description: Fill up the Item Record.

Achievements.Name: Got 1,000,000 Gold
Achievements.Description: Save your Gold: You need 1,000,000!

Achievements.Name: Closed Flying Fortress Door
Achievements.Description: You closed the Flying Fortress door without fighting the mecha robos.

Achievements.Name: Pulled in the Flying Fortress
Achievements.Description: You helped pull in the Flying Fortress without angering the Gorgo giants.

Achievements.Name: Rescued Kluke
Achievements.Description: You rescued Kluke without falling.

Achievements.Name: Got to Nene Before Bomb Went Off
Achievements.Description: You arrived at Nene's location before the time bomb went off.

Achievements.Name: Saved Kluke from Choking
Achievements.Description: You saved Kluke from being choked by Nene's collar.

Achievements.Name: Summoned Shu's Shadow
Achievements.Description: You summoned Shu's Shadow.

Achievements.Name: Escaped from Squashtrich
Achievements.Description: You escaped without being stomped by the Squashtrich.

Achievements.Name: Killer Bat: Max One Class
Achievements.Description: You achieved the highest rank for one class of the Killer Bat Shadow.

Achievements.Name: Saber-Tooth: Max One Class
Achievements.Description: You achieved the highest rank for one class of the Saber-Tooth Shadow.

Achievements.Name: Mechat Shooting Stage 2: Perfect
Achievements.Description: You destroyed all the mechat base machine guns in Mechat Shooting Stage 2.

Achievements.Name: Moon Laser: Perfect
Achievements.Description: You got a bonus for completing the Moon Laser perfectly.

Achievements.Name: Mechat Shooting Stage 3: Perfect
Achievements.Description: You cleared Mechat Shooting Stage 3 with no damage.

Achievements.Name: Killer Bat: Max All Classes
Achievements.Description: You achieved the highest rank for all classes of the Killer Bat Shadow.

Achievements.Name: Saber-Tooth: Max All Classes
Achievements.Description: You achieved the highest rank for all classes of the Saber-Tooth Shadow.

Achievements.Name: Equipped All Mechat Parts
Achievements.Description: You got all of the mechat part types and completed all enhancements.

Achievements.Name: Got All Dragon Items
Achievements.Description: You got all of the dragon items.

Achievements.Name: Escaped More Than 50 Times
Achievements.Description: You fled from battle more than 50 times.

Achievements.Name: Ambushed More Than 50 Times
Achievements.Description: You were ambushed more than 50 times.
